sect2.title: Introduction to Sendmail
sect2.para: The Sendmail package contains a Mail Transport Agent (MTA).

sect2.title: Installation of Sendmail
sect2.para: Before building Sendmail, we need to create users, groups and directories that sendmail uses with the following commands:

userinput.command: groupadd smmsp && groupadd mail && useradd -g smmsp -G mail smmsp && chmod 1777 /tmp && chmod 1777 /var/mail && mkdir /var/spool/mqueue

sect2.para: Install Sendmail with the following commands:

userinput.command: cat > devtools/Site/site.config.m4 << "EOF" define(`confMANGRP',`root') define(`confMANOWN',`root') define(`confSBINGRP',`root') define(`confUBINGRP',`root') define(`confUBINOWN',`root') EOF cd sendmail && sh Build && cd ../cf/cf && cp generic-linux.mc sendmail.mc && mkdir /etc/mail && sh Build sendmail.mc && sh Build install-cf && cd ../../ && sh Build install

sect3.title: Configuration Information

userinput.command: echo `hostname` > /etc/mail/local-host-names cat > /etc/mail/aliases << "EOF" postmaster: root MAILER-DAEMON: root EOF cp -R cf/* /etc/mail && cp cf/cf/{submit,sendmail}.mc /etc/mail && newaliases -v

sect3.para: To automate the running of Sendmail at startup, install the /etc/rc.d/init.d/sendmail init script included in the package.

note.para: The -qNm option to sendmail, where N is number of minutes, controls how often Sendmail will process the mail queue. A default of 5 minutes is used in the init script. Individual workstation users may want to set this as low as 1 minute, large installations handling more mail may want to set it higher.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Sendmail package contains mail.local, rmail, smrsh, editmap, makemap, mailq, newaliases, sendmail, vacation, praliases and mailstats.

sect3.title: mail.local
sect3.para: mail.local appends its standard input to a user's mail file.

sect3.title: rmail
sect3.para: rmail interprets incoming mail received via UUCP.

sect3.title: smrsh
sect3.para: smrsh is a restricted shell for Sendmail.

sect3.title: editmap
sect3.para: editmap queries and edits Sendmail map files.

sect3.title: mailq
sect3.para: mailq prints a summary of waiting mail messages.

sect3.title: sendmail
sect3.para: sendmail is the Sendmail mail transport agent.

sect3.title: vacation
sect3.para: vacation is an email auto responder.
